title: Understanding the Population
text: The population refers to the entire group of individuals that the city planner is interested in studying. In this case, it's not just any group of people, but a specific set related to the city park.

hintAnswer: All people visiting the city park
title: Identifying the Population
text: Consider who the city planner wants to gather data about. Is it everyone in the city, or a specific group related to the park?
choices: All people visiting the city park
